026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclint;
027
028import static org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclint.HtmlTag.Attr.*;
029
030import java.util.EnumMap;
031import java.util.EnumSet;
032import java.util.HashMap;
033import java.util.Map;
034import java.util.Set;
035import javax.lang.model.element.Name;
036
037import com.sun.tools.javac.util.StringUtils;
038
039/**
040 * Enum representing HTML tags.
041 *
042 * The intent of this class is to embody the semantics of the current HTML standard,
043 * to the extent supported/used by javadoc.
044 *
045 * This class is derivative of {@link org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.TagName}.
046 * Eventually, these two should be merged back together, and possibly made
047 * public.
048 *
049 * @see <a href="https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/">HTML Living Standard</a>
050 * @see <a href="http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/">HTML 5 Specification</a>
051 * @see <a href="http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/">HTML 4.01 Specification</a>
052 * @see <a href="http://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria/">WAI-ARIA Specification</a>
053 * @see <a href="http://www.w3.org/TR/aria-in-html/#recommendations-table">WAI-ARIA Recommendations Table</a>
054 */
055public enum HtmlTag {
056    A(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
057            attrs(AttrKind.OK, HREF, TARGET, ID),
058            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, REV, CHARSET, SHAPE, COORDS, NAME)),
059
060    ABBR(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
061            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
062
063    ACRONYM(ElemKind.HTML4, BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
064            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
065
066    ADDRESS(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
067            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
068
069    ARTICLE(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
070            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE)),
071
072    ASIDE(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
073            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE)),
074
075    B(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
076            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
077
078    BDI(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED),
079
080    BIG(ElemKind.HTML4, BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
081            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT)),
082
083    BLOCKQUOTE(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
084            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE)),
085
086    BODY(BlockType.OTHER, EndKind.REQUIRED),
087
088    BR(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.NONE,
089            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, CLEAR)),
090
091    CAPTION(BlockType.TABLE_ITEM, EndKind.REQUIRED,
092            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE, Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT),
093            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN)),
094
095    CENTER(ElemKind.HTML4, BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
096            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE)),
097
098    CITE(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
099            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
100
101    CODE(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
102            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
103
104    COL(BlockType.TABLE_ITEM, EndKind.NONE,
105            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN, CHAR, CHAROFF, VALIGN, WIDTH)),
106
107    COLGROUP(BlockType.TABLE_ITEM, EndKind.REQUIRED,
108            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN, CHAR, CHAROFF, VALIGN, WIDTH)) {
109        @Override
110        public boolean accepts(HtmlTag t) {
111            return (t == COL);
112        }
113    },
114
115    DD(BlockType.LIST_ITEM, EndKind.OPTIONAL,
116            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE,
117                Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT)),
118
119    DEL(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
120            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST),
121            attrs(AttrKind.OK, Attr.CITE, Attr.DATETIME)),
122
123    DFN(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
124            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
125
126    DIV(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
127            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE),
128            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN)),
129
130    DL(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
131            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT),
132            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, COMPACT)) {
133        @Override
134        public boolean accepts(HtmlTag t) {
135            return (t == DT) || (t == DD);
136        }
137    },
138
139    DT(BlockType.LIST_ITEM, EndKind.OPTIONAL,
140            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE, Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT)),
141
142    EM(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
143            EnumSet.of(Flag.NO_NEST)),
144
145    FONT(ElemKind.HTML4, BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED, // tag itself is
146                                                             // deprecated
147            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT),
148            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, SIZE, COLOR, FACE)),
149
150    FOOTER(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
151            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE)) {
152        @Override
153        public boolean accepts(HtmlTag t) {
154            switch (t) {
155            case HEADER:
156            case FOOTER:
157            case MAIN:
158                return false;
159            default:
160                return (t.blockType == BlockType.BLOCK)
161                    || (t.blockType == BlockType.INLINE);
162            }
163        }
164    },
165
166    FIGURE(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
167            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE)),
168
169    FIGCAPTION(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED),
170
171    FRAME(ElemKind.HTML4, BlockType.OTHER, EndKind.NONE),
172
173    FRAMESET(ElemKind.HTML4, BlockType.OTHER, EndKind.REQUIRED),
174
175    H1(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
176            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN)),
177    H2(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
178            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN)),
179    H3(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
180            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN)),
181    H4(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
182            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN)),
183    H5(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
184            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN)),
185    H6(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
186            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN)),
187
188    HEAD(BlockType.OTHER, EndKind.REQUIRED),
189
190    HEADER(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
191            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE)) {
192        @Override
193        public boolean accepts(HtmlTag t) {
194            switch (t) {
195            case HEADER:
196            case FOOTER:
197            case MAIN:
198                return false;
199            default:
200                return (t.blockType == BlockType.BLOCK)
201                    || (t.blockType == BlockType.INLINE);
202            }
203        }
204    },
205
206    HR(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.NONE,
207            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, WIDTH, ALIGN, NOSHADE, SIZE)),
208
209    HTML(BlockType.OTHER, EndKind.REQUIRED),
210
211    I(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
212            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
213
214    IFRAME(BlockType.OTHER, EndKind.REQUIRED),
215
216    IMG(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.NONE,
217            attrs(AttrKind.OK, SRC, ALT, HEIGHT, WIDTH, CROSSORIGIN),
218            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, NAME, ALIGN, HSPACE, VSPACE, BORDER)),
219
220    INS(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
221            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST),
222            attrs(AttrKind.OK, Attr.CITE, Attr.DATETIME)),
223
224    KBD(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
225            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
226
227    LI(BlockType.LIST_ITEM, EndKind.OPTIONAL,
228            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE),
229            attrs(AttrKind.OK, VALUE),
230            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, TYPE)),
231
232    LINK(BlockType.OTHER, EndKind.NONE),
233
234    MAIN(BlockType.OTHER, EndKind.REQUIRED),
235
236    MARK(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED),
237
238    MENU(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED) {
239        @Override
240        public boolean accepts(HtmlTag t) {
241            return (t == LI);
242        }
243    },
244
245    META(BlockType.OTHER, EndKind.NONE),
246
247    NAV(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
248            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE)),
249
250    NOFRAMES(ElemKind.HTML4, BlockType.OTHER, EndKind.REQUIRED),
251
252    NOSCRIPT(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED),
253
254    OL(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
255            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT),
256            attrs(AttrKind.OK, START, TYPE, REVERSED),
257            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, COMPACT)) {
258        @Override
259        public boolean accepts(HtmlTag t) {
260            return (t == LI);
261        }
262    },
263
264    P(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.OPTIONAL,
265            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT),
266            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN)),
267
268    PRE(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
269            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT),
270            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, WIDTH)) {
271        @Override
272        public boolean accepts(HtmlTag t) {
273            switch (t) {
274            case IMG:
275            case BIG:
276            case SMALL:
277            case SUB:
278            case SUP:
279                return false;
280            default:
281                return (t.blockType == BlockType.INLINE);
282            }
283        }
284    },
285
286    Q(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
287            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
288
289    S(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
290            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
291
292    SAMP(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
293            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
294
295    SCRIPT(BlockType.OTHER, EndKind.REQUIRED,
296            attrs(AttrKind.OK, SRC)),
297
298    SECTION(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
299            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE)),
300
301    SMALL(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
302            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT)),
303
304    SPAN(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
305            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT)),
306
307    STRIKE(ElemKind.HTML4, BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
308            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT)),
309
310    STRONG(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
311            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT)),
312
313    STYLE(BlockType.OTHER, EndKind.REQUIRED),
314
315    SUB(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
316            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
317
318    SUP(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
319            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
320
321    TABLE(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
322            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT),
323            attrs(AttrKind.OK, BORDER),
324            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, SUMMARY, CELLPADDING, CELLSPACING,
325                Attr.FRAME, RULES, WIDTH, ALIGN, BGCOLOR)) {
326        @Override
327        public boolean accepts(HtmlTag t) {
328            switch (t) {
329            case CAPTION:
330            case COLGROUP:
331            case THEAD:
332            case TBODY:
333            case TFOOT:
334            case TR: // HTML 3.2
335                return true;
336            default:
337                return false;
338            }
339        }
340    },
341
342    TBODY(BlockType.TABLE_ITEM, EndKind.REQUIRED,
343            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT),
344            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN, VALIGN, CHAR, CHAROFF)) {
345        @Override
346        public boolean accepts(HtmlTag t) {
347            return (t == TR);
348        }
349    },
350
351    TD(BlockType.TABLE_ITEM, EndKind.OPTIONAL,
352            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE),
353            attrs(AttrKind.OK, COLSPAN, ROWSPAN, HEADERS),
354            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, AXIS, Attr.ABBR, SCOPE, ALIGN, VALIGN, CHAR,
355                CHAROFF,
356                WIDTH, BGCOLOR, HEIGHT, NOWRAP)),
357
358    TEMPLATE(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
359            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE)),
360
361    TFOOT(BlockType.TABLE_ITEM, EndKind.REQUIRED,
362            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN, VALIGN, CHAR, CHAROFF)) {
363        @Override
364        public boolean accepts(HtmlTag t) {
365            return (t == TR);
366        }
367    },
368
369    TH(BlockType.TABLE_ITEM, EndKind.OPTIONAL,
370            EnumSet.of(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK, Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE),
371            attrs(AttrKind.OK, COLSPAN, ROWSPAN, HEADERS, SCOPE, Attr.ABBR),
372            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, WIDTH, BGCOLOR, HEIGHT, NOWRAP, AXIS, ALIGN,
373                CHAR, CHAROFF, VALIGN)),
374
375    THEAD(BlockType.TABLE_ITEM, EndKind.REQUIRED,
376            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN, VALIGN, CHAR, CHAROFF)) {
377        @Override
378        public boolean accepts(HtmlTag t) {
379            return (t == TR);
380        }
381    },
382
383    TIME(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED),
384
385    TITLE(BlockType.OTHER, EndKind.REQUIRED),
386
387    TR(BlockType.TABLE_ITEM, EndKind.OPTIONAL,
388            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, ALIGN, CHAR, CHAROFF, BGCOLOR, VALIGN)) {
389        @Override
390        public boolean accepts(HtmlTag t) {
391            return (t == TH) || (t == TD);
392        }
393    },
394
395    TT(ElemKind.HTML4, BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
396            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
397
398    U(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED,
399            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT, Flag.NO_NEST)),
400
401    UL(BlockType.BLOCK, EndKind.REQUIRED,
402            EnumSet.of(Flag.EXPECT_CONTENT),
403            attrs(AttrKind.HTML4, COMPACT, TYPE)) {
404        @Override
405        public boolean accepts(HtmlTag t) {
406            return (t == LI);
407        }
408    },
409
410    WBR(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.NONE),
411
412    VAR(BlockType.INLINE, EndKind.REQUIRED);
413
414    /**
415     * Enum representing the supportability of HTML element.
416     */
417    public enum ElemKind {
418        OK,
419        INVALID,
420        OBSOLETE,
421        HTML4
422    }
423
424    /**
425     * Enum representing the type of HTML element.
426     */
427    public enum BlockType {
428        BLOCK,
429        INLINE,
430        LIST_ITEM,
431        TABLE_ITEM,
432        OTHER
433    }
434
435    /**
436     * Enum representing HTML end tag requirement.
437     */
438    public enum EndKind {
439        NONE,
440        OPTIONAL,
441        REQUIRED
442    }
443
444    public enum Flag {
445        ACCEPTS_BLOCK,
446        ACCEPTS_INLINE,
447        EXPECT_CONTENT,
448        NO_NEST
449    }
450
451    public enum Attr {
452        ABBR,
453        ALIGN,
454        ALINK,
455        ALT,
456        ARIA_ACTIVEDESCENDANT,
457        ARIA_CONTROLS,
458        ARIA_DESCRIBEDBY,
459        ARIA_EXPANDED,
460        ARIA_LABEL,
461        ARIA_LABELLEDBY,
462        ARIA_LEVEL,
463        ARIA_MULTISELECTABLE,
464        ARIA_OWNS,
465        ARIA_POSINSET,
466        ARIA_SETSIZE,
467        ARIA_READONLY,
468        ARIA_REQUIRED,
469        ARIA_SELECTED,
470        ARIA_SORT,
471        AXIS,
472        BACKGROUND,
473        BGCOLOR,
474        BORDER,
475        CELLSPACING,
476        CELLPADDING,
477        CHAR,
478        CHAROFF,
479        CHARSET,
480        CITE,
481        CLEAR,
482        CLASS,
483        COLOR,
484        COLSPAN,
485        COMPACT,
486        COORDS,
487        CROSSORIGIN,
488        DATETIME,
489        FACE,
490        FRAME,
491        FRAMEBORDER,
492        HEADERS,
493        HEIGHT,
494        HREF,
495        HSPACE,
496        ID,
497        LINK,
498        LONGDESC,
499        MARGINHEIGHT,
500        MARGINWIDTH,
501        NAME,
502        NOSHADE,
503        NOWRAP,
504        PROFILE,
505        REV,
506        REVERSED,
507        ROLE,
508        ROWSPAN,
509        RULES,
510        SCHEME,
511        SCOPE,
512        SCROLLING,
513        SHAPE,
514        SIZE,
515        SPACE,
516        SRC,
517        START,
518        STYLE,
519        SUMMARY,
520        TARGET,
521        TEXT,
522        TYPE,
523        VALIGN,
524        VALUE,
525        VERSION,
526        VLINK,
527        VSPACE,
528        WIDTH;
529
530        private final String name;
531
532        Attr() {
533            name = StringUtils.toLowerCase(name().replace("_", "-"));
534        }
535
536        public String getText() {
537            return name;
538        }
539
540        static final Map<String, Attr> index = new HashMap<>();
541        static {
542            for (Attr t : values()) {
543                index.put(t.getText(), t);
544            }
545        }
546    }
547
548    public enum AttrKind {
549        OK,
550        INVALID,
551        OBSOLETE,
552        HTML4
553    }
554
555    // This class exists to avoid warnings from using parameterized vararg type
556    // Map<Attr,AttrKind> in signature of HtmlTag constructor.
557    private static class AttrMap extends EnumMap<Attr, AttrKind> {
558        private static final long serialVersionUID = 0;
559
560        AttrMap() {
561            super(Attr.class);
562        }
563    }
564
565    public final ElemKind elemKind;
566    public final BlockType blockType;
567    public final EndKind endKind;
568    public final Set<Flag> flags;
569    private final Map<Attr, AttrKind> attrs;
570
571    HtmlTag(BlockType blockType, EndKind endKind, AttrMap... attrMaps) {
572        this(ElemKind.OK, blockType, endKind, Set.of(), attrMaps);
573    }
574
575    HtmlTag(ElemKind elemKind, BlockType blockType, EndKind endKind,
576            AttrMap... attrMaps) {
577        this(elemKind, blockType, endKind, Set.of(), attrMaps);
578    }
579
580    HtmlTag(BlockType blockType, EndKind endKind, Set<Flag> flags,
581            AttrMap... attrMaps) {
582        this(ElemKind.OK, blockType, endKind, flags, attrMaps);
583    }
584
585    HtmlTag(ElemKind elemKind, BlockType blockType, EndKind endKind,
586            Set<Flag> flags, AttrMap... attrMaps) {
587        this.elemKind = elemKind;
588        this.blockType = blockType;
589        this.endKind = endKind;
590        this.flags = flags;
591        this.attrs = new EnumMap<>(Attr.class);
592        for (Map<Attr, AttrKind> m : attrMaps)
593            this.attrs.putAll(m);
594        attrs.put(Attr.CLASS, AttrKind.OK);
595        attrs.put(Attr.ID, AttrKind.OK);
596        attrs.put(Attr.STYLE, AttrKind.OK);
597        attrs.put(Attr.ROLE, AttrKind.OK);
598        // for now, assume that all ARIA attributes are allowed on all tags.
599        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_ACTIVEDESCENDANT, AttrKind.OK);
600        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_CONTROLS, AttrKind.OK);
601        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_DESCRIBEDBY, AttrKind.OK);
602        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_EXPANDED, AttrKind.OK);
603        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_LABEL, AttrKind.OK);
604        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_LABELLEDBY, AttrKind.OK);
605        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_LEVEL, AttrKind.OK);
606        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_MULTISELECTABLE, AttrKind.OK);
607        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_OWNS, AttrKind.OK);
608        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_POSINSET, AttrKind.OK);
609        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_READONLY, AttrKind.OK);
610        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_REQUIRED, AttrKind.OK);
611        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_SELECTED, AttrKind.OK);
612        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_SETSIZE, AttrKind.OK);
613        attrs.put(Attr.ARIA_SORT, AttrKind.OK);
614    }
615
616    public boolean accepts(HtmlTag t) {
617        if (flags.contains(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK)
618            && flags.contains(Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE)) {
619            return (t.blockType == BlockType.BLOCK)
620                || (t.blockType == BlockType.INLINE);
621        } else if (flags.contains(Flag.ACCEPTS_BLOCK)) {
622            return (t.blockType == BlockType.BLOCK);
623        } else if (flags.contains(Flag.ACCEPTS_INLINE)) {
624            return (t.blockType == BlockType.INLINE);
625        } else
626            switch (blockType) {
627            case BLOCK:
628            case INLINE:
629                return (t.blockType == BlockType.INLINE);
630            case OTHER:
631                // OTHER tags are invalid in doc comments, and will be
632                // reported separately, so silently accept/ignore any content
633                return true;
634            default:
635                // any combination which could otherwise arrive here
636                // ought to have been handled in an overriding method
637                throw new AssertionError(this + ":" + t);
638            }
639    }
640
641    public boolean acceptsText() {
642        // generally, anywhere we can put text we can also put inline tag
643        // so check if a typical inline tag is allowed
644        return accepts(B);
645    }
646
647    public String getText() {
648        return StringUtils.toLowerCase(name());
649    }
650
651    public Attr getAttr(Name attrName) {
652        return Attr.index.get(StringUtils.toLowerCase(attrName.toString()));
653    }
654
655    public AttrKind getAttrKind(Name attrName) {
656        AttrKind k = attrs.get(getAttr(attrName)); // null-safe
657        return (k == null) ? AttrKind.INVALID : k;
658    }
659
660    private static AttrMap attrs(AttrKind k, Attr... attrs) {
661        AttrMap map = new AttrMap();
662        for (Attr a : attrs)
663            map.put(a, k);
664        return map;
665    }
666
667    private static final Map<String, HtmlTag> index = new HashMap<>();
668    static {
669        for (HtmlTag t : values()) {
670            index.put(t.getText(), t);
671        }
672    }
673
674    public static HtmlTag get(Name tagName) {
675        return index.get(StringUtils.toLowerCase(tagName.toString()));
676    }
677}
